titleStmt.title: The true friend, or A bill of exchange expressed in a sermon preached at White-hall: vpon Sonday the XIII. of December, anno Domini, 1629. By Iohn Dovvle, Doctor of Divinitie, and his Maiesties chaplaine.
titleStmt.author: Dowle, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. I[ones] for Nicholas Bourne, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
